data: “I’s Weezy Wozy, and I’s two old,” said little Louise Rowe on her second birthday; and from that time forth everybody called her “Weezy,” though it wasn’t her real name any more than it is yours.
"I's Weezy Wozy, and I's _two_ old," said little Louise Rowe on her second birthday; and from that time forth everybody called her "Weezy," though it wasn't her real name any more than it is yours.
